display mode description: Following you can set the display mode of the app. Selecting 'Auto' will make sure the application theme changes based on the system theme
switch chain description: Following you can decide the chain that the app should use in order to fetch the data
change application password description: Following you can change the application password. Note that by doing this no data is cleaned from the application. After changing your password, you will have to use the new password when unlocking you wallet.
join community description: Following you can find a list of links in order to join our community. If you need any help, you can also email us at support@desmos.network
insert your password to enable biometric: Insert your password to allow login into the app with biometrics
Insert your password to allow to confirm transactions signature with biometrics
